bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a heart affection by wind evil. Su wen 素問 42: 心風之狀，多汗惡風，焦絕善怒 嚇，赤色 , 病甚則言不可快 , 診在口 , 其色赤 , “The appearance of heart wind [is such]: [patients] sweat profusely and have an aversion to wind. When the burning is extreme, they tend to be angry and cry out. Their [facial] color is red. When the disease is severe, [patients find] it impossible to speak cheerfully. This is diagnosed in the mouth. The color there is red”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 refers to heart wind in the context of a loss of the heart’s function to control the spirit and mind, e.g. xin feng fa kuang 心風發狂 , heart windwith fits of madness; xin feng jing re 心風 驚熱 , heart wind with fright and heat; xin feng dian xian 心風癲癇 , heart wind with peak-illness epilepsy; xin feng fan men 心風煩悶 , heart wind with vexation and heart-pressure, and xin feng jian wang 心風健忘 , heart wind with forgetfulness.
